channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: There’s Nothing Noble about Boston’s Fight to Keep Sanctuary Policies
item.description: Sanctuary-supporting politicians in Boston are stepping up their defiance of Trump administration enforcement priorities, joining New York and Illinoi...

item.title: ‘He Finally Shot the Hostage’: Trump’s Trade War Is a Brutal Reality Check
item.description: Trump imposing new tariffs on top of broader policy uncertainty will mean a hit to growth. The question is how large of a hit it will ultimately be.

item.title: Democrats are focusing on Musk as the main villain in the new Trump era
item.description: The Democratic Party is taking advantage of Elon Musk’s low approval ratings to tie him to unpopular Trump cutbacks in federal services.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Maine Schools are Failing While More Educational Resources are Devoted to Illegal Aliens
item.description: Policymakers in Maine have gone out of their way to make their state a magnet for illegal immigration. Along with that comes the challenge of trying t...

item.title: Trump won't rule out a recession in 2025
item.description: "I hate to predict things like that," Trump said when pressed about the possibility of a recession during a recorded interview that aired on "Sunday M...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Beijing’s deflation dilemma: Falling prices signal bigger troubles ahead for China’s economy
item.description: Such challenges are the backdrop to the annual session of China’s parliament.

item.title: DOGE’s $1 spending card limit touches everything from military research to trash pickup
item.description: The crackdown on routine expenses is part of a campaign by the president and Elon Musk to reset the scope and mission of America’s sprawling bureaucra...

item.title: Putting Trump Administration Illegal Alien Arrests and Detainers in Context
item.description: The open-borders crowd argues that relatively low numbers of ICE arrests and detainers so far mean that the task of removing illegal aliens is too har...

item.title: IRLI Attorney Testimony: Children of Illegal Aliens are Not Entitled to Birthright Citizenship
item.description: The automatic granting of U.S. citizenship to the children of illegal aliens not only rewards and encourages illegal migration but is at odds with bot...

item.title: What Antitrust ‘Reformers’ Got Wrong
item.description: Lina Khan and her allies tried to remake antitrust law. Trump’s team is likely putting an end to that.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Congress Aims to Spend More on Removing Illegal Aliens and Less on Shelter and Services Program for Them
item.description: Over the last four years, an unrelenting flow of illegal aliens poured across our borders, emboldened by open-borders policies, the promise of taxpaye...

item.title: 7 things to watch for during Trump’s joint address to Congress
item.description: Look for a more emboldened president compared to the Trump of 2017.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.

item.title: In Trump’s crowded White House, JD Vance finds a role behind the scenes
item.description: The vice president has balanced his love for public-facing mudslinging with a quieter portfolio as conciliator and backroom dealmaker.

item.title: Trump declines to rule out recession amid tariffs’ effects on markets
item.description: Trump’s acknowledgment of economic turbulence was a reversal from previous cheering of his policies, and it contrasted with reassurances from his own ...

item.title: Former Social Security official describes hostile takeover by Musk team
item.description: DOGE officials also put millions of taxpayers’ private data at risk and refused to say why they needed access to it, the official says.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.
